text: Construct a research reactor. Colonists will need access to the reactor for experimentation. It is advised to build the reactor in a secure, fireproof lab.

text: Install reactor control software and perform training exercises while testing the reactor's capabilities.

text: A skilled researcher needs to study the Rimatomics reactor designs and prepare for the construction of our first power reactor.
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to study the Rimatomics reactor designs and prepare for the construction of our first power reactor.

text: A skilled researcher needs to experiment with the research reactor. This step has a chance for catastrophic failures!
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to experiment with the research reactor. This step has a chance for catastrophic failures!

text: Build the frame for a nuclear reactor core. Note that once the frame is complete, more work must be done to finish constructing the core. It is highly recommended that the core be built in a containment room to protect colonists during fuel transfer. The thickness of the wall and HP of the materials used determines how much radiation is absorbed. We advise leaving space around the core as the frequency of radiation damage also decreases over distance.
protected_text: Build the frame for a nuclear reactor core. Note that once the frame is complete, more work must be done to finish constructing the core. It is highly recommended that the core be built in a containment room to protect colonists during fuel transfer. The thickness of the wall and HP of the materials used determines how much radiation is absorbed. We advise leaving space around the core as the frequency of radiation damage also decreases over distance.

text: The turbine requires a large quantity of turbine blades, which can be manufactured at a Rimatomics machining table.
protected_text: The turbine requires a large quantity of turbine blades, which can be manufactured at a Rimatomics machining table.

text: Connect the reactor to the turbine
protected_text: Connect the reactor to the turbine

text: Connect the reactor core to the turbine generator by constructing a (Steam pipe), and (Cold water pipe) between them. Turbines are not dangerous, and can be built outside of shielded containment rooms, but must be indoors.
protected_text: Connect the reactor core to the turbine generator by constructing a (Steam pipe), and (Cold water pipe) between them. Turbines are not dangerous, and can be built outside of shielded containment rooms, but must be indoors.

text: Build one of the available cooling systems and connect it to a turbine using (Coolant pipe). There are three available cooling systems>: water cooling requires rivers or large bodies of water, cooling towers require a lot of power and space and must be placed outside, and radiators have the lowest cooling capacity, but are smaller and cheaper to build and can be placed indoors.
protected_text: Build one of the available cooling systems and connect it to a turbine using (Coolant pipe). There are three available cooling systems>: water cooling requires rivers or large bodies of water, cooling towers require a lot of power and space and must be placed outside, and radiators have the lowest cooling capacity, but are smaller and cheaper to build and can be placed indoors.

text: Build a power transformer and connect it to the turbine using high voltage cables. A single transformer can convert up to 200kw of power from a turbine into usable electricity. Multiple transformers can be used to power different power grids. Power limit settings allow you to redistribute the power output between power grids.
protected_text: Build a power transformer and connect it to the turbine using high voltage cables. A single transformer can convert up to 200kw of power from a turbine into usable electricity. Multiple transformers can be used to power different power grids. Power limit settings allow you to redistribute the power output between power grids.

text: Build a reactor control computer and connect it to the nuclear reactor core using (Controller loom). This console is used to control reactor cores. They can be paired with specific cores by assigning an ID, allowing you to chain connections from core to core. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls. Multiple controls can be open at the same time.
protected_text: Build a reactor control computer and connect it to the nuclear reactor core using (Controller loom). This console is used to control reactor cores. They can be paired with specific cores by assigning an ID, allowing you to chain connections from core to core. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls. Multiple controls can be open at the same time.

text: Construct or purchase nuclear fuel rods and load them into the reactor core using the reactor console to designate slots for loading. Load at least two fuel assemblies side-by-side to create a chain, use the reactor console to start the core, and then raise the control rods to 8% or higher to start gathering data.
protected_text: Construct or purchase nuclear fuel rods and load them into the reactor core using the reactor console to designate slots for loading. Load at least two fuel assemblies side-by-side to create a chain, use the reactor console to start the core, and then raise the control rods to 8% or higher to start gathering data.

text: A skilled researcher needs to study how plutonium processing works, and finalize designs for a prototype fuel reprocessing facility.
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to study how plutonium processing works, and finalize designs for a prototype fuel reprocessing facility.

text: Construct a Plutonium Processor. To reduce the duration of exposure while handling radioactive fuel, it is advised that you locate the plutonium processor a short distance from reactors or spent fuel storage. Radiation suits will be required for workers that are moving radioactive fuel.
protected_text: Construct a Plutonium Processor. To reduce the duration of exposure while handling radioactive fuel, it is advised that you locate the plutonium processor a short distance from reactors or spent fuel storage. Radiation suits will be required for workers that are moving radioactive fuel.

text: Experiment with the plutonium processor (High Risk)
protected_text: Experiment with the plutonium processor (High Risk)

text: Experiment with the prototype plutonium processor, ensuring that it is functioning correctly.
protected_text: Experiment with the prototype plutonium processor, ensuring that it is functioning correctly.

text: A skilled researcher needs to experiment with the research reactor. This step has a chance for catastrophic failures!
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to experiment with the research reactor. This step has a chance for catastrophic failures!

text: A skilled researcher needs to finalize the design of the advanced reactors before they are ready for construction.
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to finalize the design of the advanced reactors before they are ready for construction.

text: Build an advanced nuclear reactor core. It is highly recommended that the core be built in a shielded containment room to protect colonists during fuel transfer.
protected_text: Build an advanced nuclear reactor core. It is highly recommended that the core be built in a shielded containment room to protect colonists during fuel transfer.

text: Power up the advanced reactor and start producing power to gather data.
protected_text: Power up the advanced reactor and start producing power to gather data.

text: A skilled researcher needs to study the designs and learn how Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generators work before we can start making our own.
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to study the designs and learn how Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generators work before we can start making our own.

text: Create some plutonium, which is required to make an RTG. To do this, spent nuclear fuel from a reactor must be processed in a plutonium processor.
protected_text: Create some plutonium, which is required to make an RTG. To do this, spent nuclear fuel from a reactor must be processed in a plutonium processor.

text: A skilled crafter needs to plan how we can make the components required for a Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generator from the resources available to us.
protected_text: A skilled crafter needs to plan how we can make the components required for a Radioisotope Thermoelectric Generator from the resources available to us.

text: A skilled researcher needs to study the designs and learn how nuclear weapons work before we can start making our own.
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to study the designs and learn how nuclear weapons work before we can start making our own.

text: Create some plutonium, which is required to make a bomb. To do this, spent nuclear fuel from a reactor must be processed in a plutonium processor.
protected_text: Create some plutonium, which is required to make a bomb. To do this, spent nuclear fuel from a reactor must be processed in a plutonium processor.

text: Experiment with the research reactor to gain a greater understanding of nuclear physics before we attempt to build a weapon.
protected_text: Experiment with the research reactor to gain a greater understanding of nuclear physics before we attempt to build a weapon.

text: Construct a weapons console. The weapons console is a manned target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons. It networks to any Rimatomics energy weapons that share the same power net, then detects enemies using the onboard sensors of the weapons and the Target Acquisition System to assign targets. The main display features real-time ground and air target tracking, and a PPC capacity gauge displays the total stored PPC energy on the net.
protected_text: Construct a weapons console. The weapons console is a manned target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons. It networks to any Rimatomics energy weapons that share the same power net, then detects enemies using the onboard sensors of the weapons and the Target Acquisition System to assign targets. The main display features real-time ground and air target tracking, and a PPC capacity gauge displays the total stored PPC energy on the net.

text: Construct a Target Acquisition and Communications System (TACS)
protected_text: Construct a Target Acquisition and Communications System (TACS)

text: Construct a TACS. The system uses a combination of technologies to track land- and air-based targets. This includes living or robotic targets, projectiles such as mortar shells or railgun sabot rounds, and long-range tracking of ballistic missiles.
protected_text: Construct a TACS. The system uses a combination of technologies to track land- and air-based targets. This includes living or robotic targets, projectiles such as mortar shells or railgun sabot rounds, and long-range tracking of ballistic missiles.

text: Construct a Liberator. It must be connected via power conduit to a weapons console to control the launch systems.
protected_text: Construct a Liberator. It must be connected via power conduit to a weapons console to control the launch systems.

text: Launch a strategic missile at any target to gather data. The amount of data gathered depends on the success of the launch, with a successful detonation on the target giving the maximum amount of data.
protected_text: Launch a strategic missile at any target to gather data. The amount of data gathered depends on the success of the launch, with a successful detonation on the target giving the maximum amount of data.

text: A skilled researcher needs to study how Rimatomics energy weapons work
protected_text: A skilled researcher needs to study how Rimatomics energy weapons work

text: Construct a Weapons Research Bench, equipped with specialized equipment for prototyping and testing a wide range of energy weapons, it is a required facility for most energy weapons research and testing, colonists will need access to the bench for experimentation, it is advised to build it in a secure fireproof lab.
protected_text: Construct a Weapons Research Bench, equipped with specialized equipment for prototyping and testing a wide range of energy weapons, it is a required facility for most energy weapons research and testing, colonists will need access to the bench for experimentation, it is advised to build it in a secure fireproof lab.

text: Researchers must perform experiments using the new weapons research bench and lay the foundations for future projects, Rimatomics energy weapons are not plug and play and the technology must be tested and understood.\nExperimentation steps can be dangerous

text: Construct a Semi Automated Command Station (SACS)
protected_text: Construct a Semi Automated Command Station (SACS)

text:
Construct a SACS, this console is a target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons, it networks to all Rimatomics energy weapons that share the same power net, then it assigns targets using the onboard sensors of the weapons combined with the Target Acquisition System (TACS).

The main display features a real time ground target and aerial projectile tracker, and a gauge displays the total stored PPC energy on the net.
Some weapons require the console to be manned to function, this will be displayed in the inspect tab for the weapon
protected_text: Construct a SACS, this console is a target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons, it networks to all Rimatomics energy weapons that share the same power net, then it assigns targets using the onboard sensors of the weapons combined with the Target Acquisition System (TACS).(PH_3)(PH_2)The main display features a real time ground target and aerial projectile tracker, and a gauge displays the total stored PPC energy on the net.(PH_1)Some weapons require the console to be manned to function, this will be displayed in the inspect tab for the weapon

text: Construct a TACS. The system uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets, this includes living or robotic targets, projectiles such as mortar shells or railgun sabot rounds, and long range tracking of ballistic missiles. text: Construct a Pulsed Power Container (PPC) and connect it to the same power net as the SACS.\n\nThese ultra-capacitors are much more efficient than standard batteries and are designed to provide the large jolts of power required by Rimatomics energy weapons. They are housed in a waterproof container and charged with excess power like a standard battery. We recommend using transformers to create isolated powernets for your PPC's and weapon arrays

text: The RA-22 Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon designed for area denial and crowd control. It heats the skin of targeted human subjects causing them to break rank and flee. Does not require line of sight. Requires a manned SACS.
protected_text: The RA-22 Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon designed for area denial and crowd control. It heats the skin of targeted human subjects causing them to break rank and flee. Does not require line of sight. Requires a manned SACS.

text: The RA-42T Tesla Coil delivers a huge electrical arc discharge to its targets resulting in severe burns or death. 100% accurate, medium range, sets targets on fire. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting.
protected_text: The RA-42T Tesla Coil delivers a huge electrical arc discharge to its targets resulting in severe burns or death. 100% accurate, medium range, sets targets on fire. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting.

text: The RA-702 High Energy Laser (HEL) destroys enemy airborne projectiles such as mortar shells. When a mortar is fired the system will check if the shell will pass through the range of a HEL, and attempt to track the target and fire once it is in range.
protected_text: The RA-702 High Energy Laser (HEL) destroys enemy airborne projectiles such as mortar shells. When a mortar is fired the system will check if the shell will pass through the range of a HEL, and attempt to track the target and fire once it is in range.

text: The RA-1802D Punisher is a 25 round magazine fed railgun platform which uses large electromagnetic pulses to launch sabot projectiles to extreme velocities and ranges. Requires line of sight. Fire mission does not require line of sight. Manned SACS required for manual targeting. Requires a manned SACS.
protected_text: The RA-1802D Punisher is a 25 round magazine fed railgun platform which uses large electromagnetic pulses to launch sabot projectiles to extreme velocities and ranges. text: The RA-2152-X Obelisk is a directed energy weapon that uses a focused solid state laser to vaporize targets. 100% accurate with long range and devastating power. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting
protected_text: The RA-2152-X Obelisk is a directed energy weapon that uses a focused solid state laser to vaporize targets. 100% accurate with long range and devastating power. Automatic targeting and firing. Manned SACS required for manual targeting

text: The RA-3b Marauder is a multi-barrel coaxial plasma railgun platform, large electromagnetic pulses fire a burst of accelerated plasma toroids to extreme velocities causing explosive radiation emitting impacts. Requires a manned SACS.
protected_text: The RA-3b Marauder is a multi-barrel coaxial plasma railgun platform, large electromagnetic pulses fire a burst of accelerated plasma toroids to extreme velocities causing explosive radiation emitting impacts. Requires a manned SACS.

text: The RA-S4 Sentinel is an energy shield that uses a combination of lasers, microwaves and arc discharges to create plasma fields which can intercept physical or energy based projectile weapons. A sensor detects a shockwave-producing event, determining a direction and distance of the shockwave relative to a defended target and calculates a firing plan, the device then attenuates the shockwave event using reflection, refraction, dispersion, absorption and momentum transfer.
protected_text: The RA-S4 Sentinel is an energy shield that uses a combination of lasers, microwaves and arc discharges to create plasma fields which can intercept physical or energy based projectile weapons. A sensor detects a shockwave-producing event, determining a direction and distance of the shockwave relative to a defended target and calculates a firing plan, the device then attenuates the shockwave event using reflection, refraction, dispersion, absorption and momentum transfer.
